attributes.action: To recognise the value of Frontline NHS staff by an immediate 10% pay rise
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to recognise the true value of our frontline healthcare staff. Clapping and fine words are not enough. Pictures in windows are not enough. These present day heroes need to be paid more, now.
attributes.background: The government refused NHS pay rises and then cheered this just before Covid19 hit us.  They need to redress this
